about_the_game:
Space-Bending Puzzle

The player can interact with a large variety of objects in the environment, from a simple block to the destructive laser beams. And most importantly of all, the player has the ability to freely travel through two parallel spaces via portals that player can place within the levels!!

Blood-Pumping Combat

While traveling through different levels, player must heed the surveillance system, placed in every corner of the map to discover the player. The game features a large variety of enemies, from land to air, small to large and from the fast-shooting turret, to the deadly laser beams. The player must be fully prepared to face the 'blood' battle that might occur at any moment.

Unique Missions and Storyline

At last, while playing, players gradually get a grasp on a majestic yet mysterious plot unfolding in front of their eyes. The further they dive into the game, the more they learn about the entire conspiracy that might influence... the future of humanity. To discover the truth, the player must investigate different places and complete objectives, from disabling the security system to escorting valuable resources, every level offers unique goals.

Space-Bending Puzzle

The player can interact with a large variety of objects in the environment, from a simple block to the destructive laser beams. And most importantly of all, the player has the ability to freely travel through two parallel spaces via portals that player can place within the levels!!

Blood-Pumping Combat

While traveling through different levels, player must heed the surveillance system, placed in every corner of the map to discover the player. The game features a large variety of enemies, from land to air, small to large and from the fast-shooting turret, to the deadly laser beams. The player must be fully prepared to face the 'blood' battle that might occur at any moment.

Unique Missions and Storyline

At last, while playing, players gradually get a grasp on a majestic yet mysterious plot unfolding in front of their eyes. The further they dive into the game, the more they learn about the entire conspiracy that might influence... the future of humanity. To discover the truth, the player must investigate different places and complete objectives, from disabling the security system to escorting valuable resources, every level offers unique goals.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6.7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo Processor (2GHz or better)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 2400 or higher / NVIDIA 8600M or higher / Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: InterSpace

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz P4, Dual Core 2.0 (or higher) or AMD64X2 (or higher)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 128 MB or more and with support for Pixel Shader 2.0b (ATI Radeon X800 or higher / NVIDIA GeForce 7600 or higher / Intel HD Graphics 2000 or higher).
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible

short_description: A portal-like puzzle game with stealth combat and unique missions for each level. It is the perfect combination of puzzle and FPS, with stunning graphic and great storyline to back it up.
